title: Tesla is a 'believe or not' religion, not a stock based on fundamentals: Robinhood exec
full_text: Tesla is a 'believe or not' religion, not a stock based on fundamentals: Robinhood exec. As the EV giant prepares to report fourth quarter earnings on Jan. 28, retail sentiment remains detached from traditional valuation metrics.. Investing in Tesla (TSLA) isn't about cars. Rather, it's a matter of faith for its loyal fans. "If you try to look at the normal things like valuation or ... earnings expectations, it's really ... n… [+2868 chars]
